turkish_example_sentence: O kalabalık pazara erken sabah giderse, taze sebze ve meyveler bulabilir.
english_example_sentence: If he goes to the crowded market early in the morning, he can find fresh vegetables and fruits.
russian_example_sentence: Если он пойдет на оживленный рынок рано утром, он сможет найти свежие овощи и фрукты.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O kalabalık pazara erken sabah ______, taze sebze ve meyveler bulabilir.
